name: naps2-rust-bindings
description: Rust bindings for NAPS2.Sdk on macOS

scripts.download-naps2: mkdir -p vendor && git clone https://github.com/cyanfish/naps2.git vendor/naps2
scripts.build:naps2helper:macos: cd csharp-helper && cp NAPS2Helper.csproj.mac NAPS2Helper.csproj && dotnet build && rm NAPS2Helper.csproj && cd .. && node scripts/generate-bindings.js macos
scripts.build:naps2helper:windows: cd csharp-helper && cp NAPS2Helper.csproj.windows NAPS2Helper.csproj && dotnet build && rm NAPS2Helper.csproj && cd .. && node scripts/generate-bindings.js windows
scripts.build:macos: npm run download-naps2 && npm run build:naps2:macos && npm run build:naps2helper:macos && npm run build:rust
scripts.build:windows: npm run download-naps2 && npm run build:naps2:windows && npm run build:naps2helper:windows && npm run build:rust
scripts.generate-bindings:macos: npm run build:naps2:macos && node scripts/generate-bindings.js macos
scripts.generate-bindings:windows: npm run build:naps2:windows && node scripts/generate-bindings.js windows
